tool_description: Generates contextually appropriate responses based on customer intent, sentiment, knowledge base content, and conversation history.

response_tone.description: Desired response tone: professional, friendly, empathetic

include_next_steps.description: Whether to include suggested next steps

error_messages: Empty customer message: Cannot generate response without customer input
Invalid intent: Intent category not recognized
Invalid sentiment: Use one of [positive, neutral, negative]
Invalid response tone: Use one of [professional, friendly, empathetic]
Invalid max_length: Must be between 50 and 2000 characters
Generation failed: Unable to generate appropriate response
usage: Provide customer_message, intent, and sentiment as minimum requirements. Include knowledge_content for informative responses. Customize with response_tone, customer_name, max_length, and include_next_steps.

response_type.description: Type of response: informational, procedural, empathetic, escalation
